title: WHAT THE HELL IS IT?
content:
Hello everyone!!!

Im an art student that is trying to type my work out in a certain font to match the theme of a company for my art project, but!!!! i cant work out which font it is?

If anyone has the knowledge in helping me to get even close to this font it would help me out big time finishing off this F\*@King project!!!  
I would be extremely greatful if anyone can help!!!

Thanks to whoever cares

Phil :P

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071018175900im_/http:/typophile.com/files/big_6224.jpg)

 [‹ Leg up in logotype design](http://web.archive.org/web/20071018175900/http:/typophile.com/node/28351 "Go to previous forum topic") [Complimentary Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071018175900/http:/typophile.com/node/28274 "Go to next forum topic")
author: philion

comments.content:
Printed from a dot matrix printer, there are some similar fonts but you won’t get exactly that font as it is probably specific to the output device.  
Have a look here  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=matrix](http://web.archive.org/web/20071018175900/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=matrix "http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=matrix")

A distressed font like this might work for you  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typefetish/cheapo/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071018175900/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typefetish/cheapo/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typefetish/cheapo/")

or this  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fonthead/matrix-dot/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071018175900/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fonthead/matrix-dot/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fonthead/matrix-dot/")

Tim

as timd states, that’s less of a specific font and more of the aeshtetic of a particular printing technology.

If you really like that look, print out the alphabet, then scan it in.
